column2:
"Huh. I haven't seen you before. Or have I?
Sorry, I've always been bad with faces."

"I'm Maria. I've been an op since before time
began. Ha ha."

"Care to hear some advice about the dragorii?
Well, you don't have a choice."

"Like their habitat, they're a people of extremes.
They're incredibly isolationist, and they love
what they like and hate what they don't."

"Get in good with them, and you're like family.
Piss them off, and you're dead."

"Right now, ARKS is closer to the dead side
of things. I'm sure that's hardly news if you've
fought half as many of them as I have."

"There was a time when we could talk things
out with them more, but these days they've
grown very aggressive."

"And once the others start to see you beating up
the ones that attack, they're that much likelier
to take you for an enemy, too. It's a nasty cycle."

"They've got their own culture, their own values.
If you hope to communicate with them, you'd
better get a grasp of those first."
"Hm... Sarah should be on the move by now."

"Which means I should be going, too. I'll try to
remember your face, but apologies in advance
if I've forgotten you the next time we meet."

"ん……アンタ、あまり見覚えがないな。
ああいや、以前に会っていたら失礼
アタシ、顔を覚えるのが苦手なんだ。"

"アタシは、マリア。
わりと古参のアークスさ。"

"さて、失礼ついでの老婆心に
ひとつ龍族について、話でもしようか。"

"龍族ってのはとても極端でね。
言ってしまえばすごく閉鎖的。
好き嫌いの判別が激しいんだ。"

"仲間と見れば気を許すが
敵と見れば容赦しない。"

"アークスは……どちらかっていうと
敵としてみられてるね。
よーく襲われるだろう？"

"昔はもう少し話が通じたんだけど
最近は、ちょっと凶暴なのが多いかな。"

"そうして襲いかかってくる龍族を
倒していると、さらに嫌われていって
敵とみなされる……面倒なもんだよ。"

"龍族には龍族の文化もあるし
交流するつもりなら、彼らの文明観を
把握してないと、対応には困るかもね。"
"……さて、そろそろサラが動くかな。"

"それじゃ、アタシは行く。
アンタの顔、なるべく覚えておくよ。
次会った時、忘れてたらゴメンね。"
